name: Rizzle's Roadhouse
address: 590 Low Hill Rd, Brownsville, PA 15417, USA

reviews.text: The owner takes pride of his cooking. He goes out in the dining room and asks how everyone likes his cooking.

Good experience during day time, food is always great you can eat inside or outside patio area. My favorite! Food is somewhat expensive for two people expect to pay about $100 dollars but it depends on what you order too, and if you‚Äôre drinking alcohol that is what doubles and triples that $100 dollars.

Best Wings and food around

Rizzle's Roadhouse is everything you want in a local spot‚Äîwarm, welcoming, and absolutely awesome food.

The wings are hands-down the best in the area, with a variety of sauces the Rizzles sauce is amazing. We also tried the perogies and the fish and it was the best I have had in a long time.

Whether you're stopping by for a casual dinner or looking for a place to unwind with friends, Rizzle's Roadhouse delivers. Great food, great service, and a great time. We'll definitely be back.

WOW! What a gem this place is. It has everything you could want. The decor is fun, the food is DELICIOUS and fresh, and the prices are great. I loved the fresh cut French fries they were hot and seasoned perfectly. My husband had the whole wings and he chose their ‚ÄúRizzle‚Äù signature sauce flavor. The recipe is a secret but I would say it‚Äôs a delicious garlicky mild sauce.. it‚Äôs really good!  The service was excellent, very friendly and attentive. The place has so much charm and fun accents yet the restaurant and bathrooms were both very clean which I notice. Overall I would give it 10/10 and I can‚Äôt wait to go back!! Loved it
Would rate the food but after sitting for 20 minutes without any service we decided to leave.

I had an amazing dinner at Rizzle‚Äôs Roadhouse and left thoroughly impressed. The highlight of the meal was the crabcakes, which were truly exceptional‚Äîpacked with real crab meat instead of filler, flavorful, and perfectly cooked. Paired with a side of fresh steamed broccoli, it was both simple and delicious.
The service was excellent‚Äîfriendly, attentive, and made the whole experience feel welcoming without being rushed. On top of that, the prices were very reasonable, making it easy to enjoy a high-quality meal without breaking the bank.
Overall, Rizzle‚Äôs Roadhouse offers a wonderful balance of affordability, great food, and attentive service. If you‚Äôre looking for a place where you can get both quality and value, I‚Äôd highly recommend giving this spot a try.
Excellent service,  wll definitely recommend to my friends and family.
Excellent service , great atmosphere , delicious food
Food is awesome...Nice employees, good vibes!

Was in the area and wanted to stop and try something along the way. Couldn't of asked for a better experience! The Server was super friendly and the cook hand delivered some if their custom dishes such as the Pennsylvania Perogi Platter with a smile. Idk who was more excited lol. It was delicious. Im old fashioned and got a burger and fresh cut fries and it was cooked to perfection. The meat was freshly prepared. We will absolutely stop back here to the great food and vibes! Also awesome 80's and 90's jams im a sucker for. Awesome job guys! We will be back 100%

We ended up here because our original destination was closed but we are happy we did.  First of all, I'm a bit of a food snob. Their special was a NY strip dinner for 15.99, so I figured it would be less than impressive for that price.  I was pleasantly surprised and their cook did a perfect "rare".  My mom had the walleye and loved it.  Our waitress was great. They had a bunch of happy hour drink specials.  The prices are lower than most places... I thought they must have forgotten to charge us for something because the bill was alot lower than we expected.  They have an extensive menu, so we will definitely be back.
Food is hot and delicious! Service is excellent!
Very good food, friendly service.  Great portion sizes.
Fantastic place for great food and good drinks, everyone was super friendly highly recommend.

We've been dining at this restaurant for over a year, and the food has always been consistently delicious. No matter what we order, it's always flavorful and satisfying. However, on our last visit prior to this one, the service was unfortunately terrible, which made us hesitant to return for a while.

That changed recently when we decided to give it another try on wing night‚Äîand we‚Äôre so glad we did! The wings were absolutely the best we‚Äôve ever had there, and the service completely turned around our experience.

Our server, Megan, was phenomenal. Friendly, attentive, and efficient, she made sure everything was perfect from start to finish. Honestly, Megan is the best server we‚Äôve ever had at this restaurant. Her exceptional service really made our night.

We‚Äôll definitely be back again‚Äîand next time, we‚Äôll make sure Megan is working before we go. She made all the difference!
Great food, fantastic staff, had wings and mozz sticks. Both were fabulous., prices were cheaper than the competition.  Will be back often
Great food, great service, A++
Wood fire pizza couldn‚Äôt even be cut it was so hard, tocos had absolutely no tast with stale cheese on them. Will not be coming back ever!
Best wings in the country. Service was also awesome. Waitresses were üî•
Whether there for a large holiday party or dropping by for a happy hour beer, Chris and his staff have always been great.
Destiny is the best bartender! Food is also great for the price!
Best food around! Staff is so friendly! Prices are very reasonable!

We have eaten there before and and the food takes way too long we waited over an hour and a half all the food was absolutely horrible. We called in at 12 o‚Äôclock to let them know that we had 15 Every single thing that everybody ordered was absolutely terrible undercooked and I would never go back there ever again
Great wings! Cold beers! Awesome Specials!

If you‚Äôre looking for a great place for great food. Look no further. The conventional menu items are delicious and the non conventional menu items (Pierogies with bier cheese and onions) are what sets this place apart from everyone else. Quality service from the bartenders (Tabby, Mattie, and Destiny) make you feel like you just fit in. And lastly the prices, well what can I say, the prices are some of the best around. So if you‚Äôre out and about stop in, you won‚Äôt be disappointed by anything.
Waited entirely too long for our food.  We got a hoagie and a burger and waited for 45 minutes for them.

The wings are delicious and their homemade sauces are right on point. The beer is cold and  service is great. Never have to wait for a beverage. I highly recommend stopping in. He won‚Äôt be disappointed.

Bartenders are great
Great Service
Good place to hang out
the best bar evaaaaa
Awesome wings love the service food is always good
Awesome atmosphere. Their house sauce served with the chicken wings is phenomenal. Good seasoning on the fries. Definitely recommend.
Was here to watch some live music...the place was packed and the staff handled everything like champs...food was great...music was great....staff was great...will be back...
Great food, Live music, cold drinks! What else do you need!

All of the bartenders are wonderful! They always go above and beyond for the customers. It‚Äôs a laid back environment. You always feel like you‚Äôre having dinner and drinks with family no matter where you sit! Chris has done an amazing job with this establishment! Love it there!

All I can say is wow! First time going and I can't believe how fantastic the food was! The variety alone had me shocked!
We sat down after a party of 16 walked In and I was nervous with how long our food would take, but it came out so fast even after the fact! Definitely going back for the seafood boil!
Good service, good food, good environment.
The place to go in fredericktown!
Have been here a couple times now. Great burger, apps, and atmosphere. Can‚Äôt recommend the wings and peanut butter pie enough.
Amazing seafood and the peanut butter pie is to die for!
Phenomenal food with phenomenal staff that go above and beyond! We love it here.(:

Had a suprise party there. Chris the owner went above and beyond for my party. Chris catered all of the food, and it all was absolutely amazing. We had chicken, salad pizza and pasta for the party. The pasta was so good, those meatballs were the best I have ever had.  The staff was the greatest we all could ask for, those  women took care of my whole party,  asked repeatedly if i needed help setting up and still took care of their regular customers. The room was very large with plenty of seating, we had 52 people and had alot of space. If you ever need a place to have a get together, go see Chris. I highly recommend this place and will be returning for more experiences there. They also have a outside screened in patio for those summer get together.
Always a great time and yummy food. We come every Thursday for wing night. Big Juicy Wings ü™Ω

Nice dining area for a great evening with friends and kids. Good prices and amazing food. The rubs and seasonings are top notch and good portion sizes. Service was very fast and we came late with a larger party. You won‚Äôt be disappointed!
Great restaurant for family and friends!   Atmosphere is very chill and the staff is super fast and friendly.   Wings are HUGE and the new burgers are the bomb!

Rizzles Roadhouse (formerly known as Roxy‚Äôs) never disappoints.
The menu is a very wide variety ranging from salads, steaks, burgers, pizzas, wings, and Seafood.
The patio is spacious for a bar and there is fair amount of space in the dining room to accommodate families with children of all ages. The prices are competitive and the owner is very present in the establishment. If I could recommend anything specific I would say the whole wings and I am a sucker for a good Rueben.

I ordered the scallops and they gave me twice as much as any other restaurant would which were delicious. Service was great seafood was wonderful. my daughter-in-law had a crab legs and she says one week they were there three times. Kudos to this new restaurant that opened up!
The service and food were very good! I had the REUBEN Sandwich and loved it.

Came here for the first time to see what new owner has done. He was the nicest owner and went above and beyond to make our dinner just perfect. He and the server made a great working pair. They worked their butts off waiting on us and other customers. Owner even gave my kids little ice cream cups!  Love that it is no smoking now! We will be back for sure!
Recently attended a birthday party and the staff was incredible. This was my first time at Rizzle's and I will definitely be going back. The food, staff, and atmosphere were amazing.

A nice Local Bar and Restaurant. My wife and I decided to try them out since New Owners took over! We got Wings and Fries with Beer cheese (waitress brought cold nacho cheese but another waitress helped us and brought out warm beer cheese) I don't know if our waitress was new or what but we asked a few questions about menu items and she had no clue of ingredients. But that won't stop us from going back! Wings were fantastic by the way!!
This place has great wings with a wide variety of sauces. In my opinion, they are the best in the area. Every time we go the whole family enjoys the food and staff. We have never had a bad meal here.

We have been boating at green cove for 4 years now. Not sure why we just now tried it here.   This is hands down the best restaurant in town.  We got t-bone and filet mignon. Both were cooked and seasoned to perfection.  Would definitely recommend.
Great spot for good friends and food. We watched The Classics play the evening we were there.
Owner is great. Talented in the kitchen. Food and service were very good. Would definitely go back again.
